description: Learn how to make these devilishly scary eyeball jelly cups with only five simple ingredients. They're extremely easy to make and are sure to impress.
name: Easy Halloween Eyeball Jelly Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the eyes, halve marshmallows horizontally, then top sticky side with a Smartie. Use writing icing to draw veins and pupils. Allow to set before topping jellies, then serve.
